glsa.title: KOffice, KWord, KPDF, KDE Graphics Libraries: Stack-based buffer overflow
glsa.synopsis: KPDF includes code from xpdf that is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow.

background.p: KOffice is an integrated office suite for KDE. KWord is the KOffice word processor. KPDF is a KDE-based PDF viewer included in the kdegraphics package.

description.p: KPDF includes code from xpdf that is vulnerable to an integer overflow in the StreamPredictor::StreamPredictor() function.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted PDF file in KWord or KPDF that would exploit the integer overflow to cause a stack-based buffer overflow in the StreamPredictor::getNextLine() function, possibly resulting in the execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
